entity.orimod.spirit.name: Spirit
config.orimod.spirit_abilities.air_jumps: The amount of jumps a spirit can perform in the air. 1 is double jump, and 2 is triple jump.
config.orimod.spirit_abilities.know_doub: Whether or not Spirit players will know how to double jump as soon as becoming one.
config.orimod.spirit_abilities.know_dash: Whether or not Spirit players will know how to dash on land as soon as becoming one.
config.orimod.spirit_abilities.know_air_: §lRequires Dash to use! §rWhether or not Spirit players will know to dash whilst in the air.
config.orimod.spirit_abilities.know_wate: §lRequires Dash to use! §rWhether or not Spirit players will know to dash whilst in water.
config.orimod.spirit_management.default_: The Default State mandates whether or not new saves (or new players, on servers) will start out as a Spirit by default.
config.orimod.spirit_management.force_st: If enabled, all players, including those that have the permission to change whether or not they are a Spirit, will be forced to either be a Player or a Spirit based on the Default State.
config.orimod.spirit_management.allow_ch: Whether or not to allow players to change between Player and Spirit. There is a permissions file that dictates who is explicitly allowed to, and who is explicitly not allowed to, which can be used to override this value per player.
config.orimod.light_energy.env_flux.desc: If enabled, environments of §5Decay §ror §bLight §rwill generally remove or add energy from or to Light-based devices respectively.
config.orimod.light_energy.env_power.des: If enabled, environments of §5Decay §ror §bLight §rwill reduce or improve the efficiency of Light-based devices respectively.
